Account Id.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with the campaign label.

Campaign.description: The name or title of the campaign to which the label is applied.

Client Id.description: The unique identifier of the client associated with the campaign label.

Id.description: The unique identifier of the campaign label.

Parent Id.description: The unique identifier of the parent item associated with the campaign label.

Modified Time.description: The date and time when the campaign label was last modified.

Status.description: The current status of the campaign label (e.g., active, paused, deleted).
